description.text: Increase the number of ki points you gain from the ki pool rogue talent to be equal to 1/2 your rogue level + your highest mental ability score modifier (Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma) and you can spend 2 ki points as a swift action to gain the skill unlocks for one skill of your choice as appropriate for the number of ranks in that skill. This benefit lasts for 1 minute.
